question.qText: Choose the statement that best describes the relationship between the political situation depicted on the map and the development of the Italian Renaissance.

aBtn.aText: <font size='16'>There is no relationship between the Peace of Lodi and the Italian Renaissance.</font>
<font size='16'>The leaders of the city states devoted themselves to becoming Renaissance scholars and writers, not warriors.</font>
<font size='16'>The leaders and wealthy merchants of the city states could use their resources as patrons of the arts and learning of the Italian Renaissance.</font>
